programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o strget.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
strset 1, "fox.wav" strset 2, "beats.wav"
instr 1
Sfile strget p4 asig soundin Sfile outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2.7 1 i 1 + 2 2 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
